SELECT sys_id, order_no, reference_no, order_cates, user_id, cellphone_no, order_time, total_qty, status, remark, parent_no, user_channel, is_deleted, creationtime FROM order_main WHERE 1=1
AND user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.userId}, '%')

SELECT om.sys_id sysId, om.order_no orderNo, om.order_time orderTime, oc.customer_name customerName,
epm.package_name packageName, oex.exam_master_item examMasterItem, oai.appointment_cates appointmentCates, oai.option_1 option_1, om.parent_no parentNo, om.status
FROM order_main om LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai ON oai.order_no = om.sys_id LEFT JOIN order_customer oc ON oc.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN exam_package_main epm ON epm.sys_id = om.reference_no LEFT JOIN order_extension_exam oex ON oex.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_payment op ON op.order_no = om.order_no WHERE 1=1 AND om.is_deleted = 0
AND om.status = #{params.status}

SELECT om.sys_id sysId, om.order_no orderNo, epm.package_name packageName, epm.subtitle, epm.content, ea.service_name serviceName, epa.periods, ea.cates, oai.amount, em.name emName, ed.item_name itemName, oee.exam_master_item examMasterItem, ub.full_name fullName, om.total_qty totalQty, oc.customer_name customerName FROM order_main om LEFT JOIN exam_package_main epm ON epm.sys_id = om.reference_no LEFT JOIN exam_package_append epa ON epm.sys_id = epa.package_main_id LEFT JOIN exam_append ea ON ea.sys_id = epa.append_id LEFT JOIN exam_package_detail epd ON epd.exam_main_id = epm.sys_id LEFT JOIN exam_master em ON em.sys_id = epd.exam_master_id LEFT JOIN exam_detail ed ON ed.sys_id = epd.exam_detail_id LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai ON oai.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_extension_exam oee ON oee.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN user_basic ub ON ub.user_id = om.user_id LEFT JOIN order_customer oc ON oc.order_no = om.order_no WHERE 1=1 AND om.is_deleted = 0
AND om.sys_id = #{params.sysId}

SELECT om.sys_id sysId, om.order_no orderNo, oee.exam_master_item examMasterItem, om.status, oc.customer_name customerName, oc.id_no idNo, oc.gender, oc.cellphone_no1 cellphoneNo1, oc.cellphone_no2 cellphoneNo2, uc.card_cates cardCates, uc.card_no cardNo, si.name siName, oa.time_from timeFrom, oa.time_to timeTo, om.order_time orderTime, om.user_channel userChannel, oai.amount FROM order_main om LEFT JOIN order_extension_exam oee ON oee.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_customer oc ON oc.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_appointment oa ON oa.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai ON oai.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN sys_institution si ON si.institution_id = oa.institution_id LEFT JOIN user_cards uc ON om.user_id = uc.user_id WHERE 1=1 AND om.is_deleted = 0
AND om.sys_id = #{params.sysId}

SELECT om.sys_id sysId, om.order_no orderNo, oee.exam_master_item examMasterItem, om.status, oc.customer_name customerName, oc.id_no idNo, oc.gender, oc.cellphone_no1 cellphoneNo1, oc.cellphone_no2 cellphoneNo2, uc.card_cates cardCates, uc.card_no cardNo, si.name siName, oa.time_from timeFrom, oa.time_to timeTo, om.order_time orderTime, om.user_channel userChannel, oai.amount, sd.department_name departmentName FROM order_main om LEFT JOIN order_extension_exam oee ON oee.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_customer oc ON oc.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_appointment oa ON oa.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai ON oai.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN sys_institution si ON si.institution_id = oa.institution_id LEFT JOIN user_cards uc ON om.user_id = uc.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_department sd ON sd.sys_id = oa.department_id WHERE 1=1 AND om.is_deleted = 0
AND om.sys_id = #{params.sysId}
